name: Cards of Terra
description:
Cards of Terra is a single player card game. 

You play as an alien-princess crashlanded in a fantasy realm. Use your psi-powers to make fantasy creatures fight each other. Dozens of creatures with different abilities and wide variety of levels create a unique and engaging gameplay never seen  before in card games.

Full game will feature more than 60 unique levels with several boss fights and a unique Endless mode.
